examples.example: 我精心挑选了一个漂亮的本子，用来记录生活中的美好瞬间。

translate.english: I carefully selected a beautiful notebook to record the beautiful moments in life.

examples.example: 我把重要的事情都记在这个本子上，随时提醒自己不要忘记。

translate.english: I write down all the important things in this notebook to remind myself not to forget at any time.

examples.example: 我在本子上认真地写下自己的目标和计划，时刻激励自己不断前进。

translate.english: I carefully write down my goals and plans in the notebook, always inspiring myself to keep moving forward.
